Posts.EditableText: Is there a way to have quick-time events in a 'Gamebook'?
Posts.HTML: Is there a way to have quick-time events in a 'Gamebook'?

Posts.EditableText:
what are quick time events?

ok I googled it.

you could set up time specific scenes using timers, although action generally isn't well suited to interactive fiction imo.
Posts.HTML:
what are quick time events?

Posts.EditableText: An interesting view on this is covered in this article: http://www.reocities.com/aetus_kane/writing/cam.html The entire .pdf containing this article as the first chapter is worth a read: <alert! Pdf download warning!!!1!> http://mirrors.ibiblio.org/interactive- ... ryBook.pdf
